textBox.richText: On the way to Saint Tropez we drove a good portion of the upcoming Monaco to Brignoles leg of the 2009 Tour de France. God knows why Lance Armstrong wants to come out of retirement - Felicity and I broke out in a sweat and we were conquering it in a car. Maybe it was due to the fact we were following footsteps of Ari Vatanen and taking the stage as he did Pikes Peak compounded with the fact the mountainous road was minus barriers! Following the blistering time set during the rally stage we dined a hero’s lunch (pity we didn’t get a hero’s reception) in St Maxime before heading around the coast to Saint Tropez. Apparently Bridget Bardot made Saint Tropez famous for a raunchy film set in the 50’s. Didn’t see much resembling that kind of behaviour but it a nice little town - somewhat influenced by tourists and the million dollars worth of cruisers sitting in the harbour.
